data.meta_description: Looking for episode specific information Crayon Shin-chan on episode 132? Then you should check out MyAnimeList! Shin-chan and his mother visit Keiko and her new born baby, Hitoshi. Shin-chan gets very excited to see such a small child and plays with him. Kazama bunks his English lecture and goes to Shin-chan's place. Misae gets to know about Kazama and takes him back to his mother. Kazama and his mother get emotional and cry. (Source: TVDB)

Edit

Duration: 00:21:00

Aired: Feb 6, 1995(JST)

Synopsis

Shin-chan and his mother visit Keiko and her new born baby, Hitoshi. Shin-chan gets very excited to see such a small child and plays with him. Kazama bunks his English lecture and goes to Shin-chan's place. Misae gets to know about Kazama and takes him back to his mother. Kazama and his mother get emotional and cry.

(Source: TVDB)
